segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to get those cookies, and the stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting, like she doesn’t even care about the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, completely missing the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to slip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just going to watch it happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll all end up in a big mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s like a circus.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
